Name: Farplane Relic
About the game: 《Farplane Relic》 is an action adventure game including random elements like Rougue-like. It represents an exciting adventure story that vicious otherworld monsters swept the protagonist Momo’s world by Relic Door, and Momo was sucked into Relic. ● Weapon system All weapons have two skill types: common and special, forming a unique fighting style. You will like it. ● Skill system & Skill upgrade system Abundant skills (Active, Buff) escort for your trip. Part skills can be upgraded into stronger type with branches, and into the best type based on the current situation. ● Unique soul system Unique Trigger + Perform-Match Mechanics could form hundreds of different combinations, greatly increasing playability. ● Scene weapon Dungeons are full of weapons everywhere, eg, you can throw the torch into monster’s face. ● Plant system Seeds obtained in Relics can be planted in camp when you dead, and can be seemed as supply when matured. ● Rune system Rune obtained to unlock groove. Please put the most valuable rune you think into the limited groove. ● Multiple monsters ● Fluent battles ● Random dungeon Waiting for your participation！
